title: The Last Mile
description: The Last Mile is a narrative-driven action adventure. Step into the role of Nick Rieger, a man on the run from his past and the law. Your journey is in your hands – with shifting routes and events that shape a unique story of guilt, redemption, and hope.
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![The Last Mile-15mwr](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/440e56f0afa44d7c9a34d8a0875a5135/the-last-mile-15mwr.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**The Last Mile** is a gripping, story-driven action adventure where you step into the shoes of Nick Rieger, a man on the run from a dark past and relentless justice. But this is not just a tale of escape – it’s a test of who you become when everything else is stripped away.

Blending a cinematic narrative with dynamic world progression, The Last Mile challenges players to navigate branching paths, shifting situations, and optional side quests based on their decisions.
Same story – different journey. Every choice affects who you meet, what you experience, and how far you’re willing to go to survive.

<!--image-->
![The Last Mile-1amwg](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/440e56f0afa44d7c9a34d8a0875a5135/the-last-mile-1amwg.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
The Last Mile explores themes of emotion, betrayal, humanity, and moral conflict. Follow Nick Rieger’s journey as he battles both internal demons and external threats. Prepare for dark twists, deeply personal moments, and decisions that carry real weight.

<!--image-->
![The Last Mile-17wqe](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/440e56f0afa44d7c9a34d8a0875a5135/the-last-mile-17wqe.png)

<!--image-->
![The Last Mile-1ukzl](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/440e56f0afa44d7c9a34d8a0875a5135/the-last-mile-1ukzl.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
While the core storyline remains the same, the way you reach the end is entirely shaped by your choices. You may unlock – or miss – different environments: a city apartment, an industrial complex, a remote trailer, an abandoned village… Each map offers unique challenges, NPCs, and side missions.

<!--image-->
![The Last Mile-1rd8w](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/440e56f0afa44d7c9a34d8a0875a5135/the-last-mile-1rd8w.png)

<!--image-->
![The Last Mile-6lygm](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/440e56f0afa44d7c9a34d8a0875a5135/the-last-mile-6lygm.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
At critical points, you’ll be faced with hard decisions. These aren’t simple right-or-wrong choices – they revolve around survival, trust, and sacrifice. Some consequences are immediate, others unfold much later.

<!--image-->
![The Last Mile-sejmz](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/440e56f0afa44d7c9a34d8a0875a5135/the-last-mile-sejmz.png)

<!--image-->
![The Last Mile-1g9xj](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/440e56f0afa44d7c9a34d8a0875a5135/the-last-mile-1g9xj.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Each location is crafted for stealth, environmental storytelling, and resourceful progression. Rather than direct combat, tension arises from escape, evasion, and creative problem-solving.

<!--image-->
![The Last Mile-l8l5f](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/440e56f0afa44d7c9a34d8a0875a5135/the-last-mile-l8l5f.png)

<!--image-->
![The Last Mile-ndeha](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/440e56f0afa44d7c9a34d8a0875a5135/the-last-mile-ndeha.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
A stylized visual approach emphasizes rain, light, shadow, and desolate scenery to build an immersive, film-like mood. Complemented by ambient sound design and reactive music, the world pulls you in completely.

<!--image-->
![The Last Mile-1gpqd](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/440e56f0afa44d7c9a34d8a0875a5135/the-last-mile-1gpqd.png)
